ActorFrame.OnCommand: %function(self) local children = self:GetChildren() math.randomseed(math.random() * 1000000 + Second() * Hour() * DayOfYear()) local fail = math.random(1, 46) local actor = children[1] if OatProfile().OATFailGifs then actor:Load(Path('Graphics', '_grade models/fail/fail' .. fail)) actor:stretchto(-25, -25, 50, 50) else actor:Load(Path('Graphics', '_grade models/f.gif')) actor:zoom(0.85) end end
